::Spears::

"Leave it to two heros to make life difficult." She pulled out two 
more quills and threw them at the preds. "Fine then, I can't leave 
you two alone and have all the fun."  she pulled out another two 
quills.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Rodimus Prime::
> 
> "Spears, if you want to leave, go! I'm staying and fighting." He 
said,
> bravely.
